import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const Weather = props => { return(

Weather

{weatherdata !== null ? (
Favorite Locations
{updateInfo('Ottawa')}}> Ottawa, Canada
{updateInfo('Beijing')}}> {image} Beijing, Canada
{updateInfo('New York')}}> New York, Canada
{updateInfo('Irvine')}}> Irvine, Canada
{weatherdata.name}, ON
{image}
{toggle === true ? Math.round(weatherdata.main.temp - 273.15)+ '°C' : weatherdata.main.temp + '°F'}
{weatherdata.weather[0].main}
) : null}
) } export default Weather;
